snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin’s support of President Bashar al-Assad has reflected his wariness of Western intervention but perhaps also an underestimation of the uprising in Syria.
abstract: Memo From Russia; President Vladimir V Putin’s support of President Bashar al-Assad reflects his wariness of Western intervention and perhaps also illustrates an underestimation of the uprising in Syria; since the Arab uprisings began, Russian leaders have viewed them through this lens, as a product not of social change but of interference by the West, intended in part to damage Russia.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin’s support of President Bashar al-Assad has reflected his wariness of Western intervention but perhaps also an underestimation of the uprising in Syria.

headline.seo: Putin Tested on Principles and Practicality in Syria
headline.main: For Putin, Principle vs. Practicality on Syria
headline.print_headline: For Putin, Principle vs. Practicality on Syria
